liturgicalNFTs.name: Panis Angelicus
liturgicalNFTs.description: Panis angelicus fit panis hominum. The bread of angels becomes the bread of humanity.

voiceover.latin: Panis angelicus fit panis hominum. Dat panis caelicus figuris terminum.
voiceover.english: The bread of angels becomes the bread of men. The heavenly bread ends all symbols.

liturgicalNFTs.name: Ave Verum Corpus
liturgicalNFTs.description: Ave verum corpus natum de Maria Virgine. Hail, true body born of the Virgin Mary.

voiceover.latin: Ave verum corpus natum de Maria Virgine.
voiceover.english: Hail, true body born of the Virgin Mary.

liturgicalNFTs.name: Lux Aeterna
liturgicalNFTs.description: Lux aeterna luceat eis, Domine. May eternal light shine upon them, O Lord.

voiceover.english: May eternal light shine upon them, O Lord.

liturgicalNFTs.name: Adeste Fideles
liturgicalNFTs.description: Adeste fideles, laeti triumphantes. O come, all ye faithful, joyful and triumphant.

voiceover.english: O come, all ye faithful, joyful and triumphant.

liturgicalNFTs.name: Ave Maria
liturgicalNFTs.description: Ave Maria, gratia plena. Hail Mary, full of grace.

liturgicalNFTs.name: Tu sei la mia vita
liturgicalNFTs.description: Tu sei la mia vita, altro io non ho. You are my life, I have nothing else.

voiceover.latin: Tu es vita mea, nihil aliud habeo.
voiceover.english: You are my life, I have nothing else.
